frontmatter.title: Fusion SDS
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion SDS
description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

<PageDescription>

More ways to explore

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Articles and blogs</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Videos</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

## Articles and blogs

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Introduction to application resiliency"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/venkat-kolli/2023/05/05/introduction-to-fusion-resiliency-for-applications?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Built for OpenShift - better together"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/eran-tamir/2023/03/29/built-for-openshift-better-together?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="IBM and Red Hat lead the Industry for Kubernetes data services"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/pete-brey/2023/02/24/ibm-and-red-hat-lead-the-industry-for-kubernetes-d?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Greybeards talk Data Orchestration"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://greybeardsonstorage.com/tag/ibm-spectrum-fusion/"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Digital transformation - Catalyst for a new storage paradigm"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/greg-deffenbaugh/2023/11/02/digital-transformation-catalyst-for-a-new-storage?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="My storage has CSI drivers, why do I need Fusion?"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/greg-deffenbaugh/2024/01/10/my-storage-has-csi-drivers-why-do-i-need-ibm-fusio?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 1 (why is this so complex?)"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/07/27/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-restore-recipe-1?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 2 (orchestration and Recipes)"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/08/01/how-ibm-storage-fusion-simplifies-backup-and-recov?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="How Fusion simplifies backup/restore - part 3 (Recipe deep dive)"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/08/04/how-ibm-storage-fusion-simplifies-backup-and-recov?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="The Fusion git repository for backup/restore recipes"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/09/18/ibm?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Data Protection as code"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/greg-deffenbaugh/2023/06/22/data-protection-as-code?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Backup as code"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jc-lopez/2023/06/07/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-as-code?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Observability and monitoring with IBM Fusion"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/sahil-tah/2024/01/09/observability-and-monitoring-with-storage-fusion?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="IBM Fusion at TechXchange 2023"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jc-lopez/2023/08/29/ibm-storage-fusion-techxchange-2023-jcl?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

## Videos

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Making hybrid cloud a reality"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a-vem8BG7aU"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Hybrid cloud](/images/hybrid-cloud.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="IBM Fusion and Red Hat OpenShift integration"
  subTitle="Office hours"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JKiGDEuiufg"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![OpenShift integration](/images/office-hours.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Using Fusion to backup an application"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=__KEsyqwYJg"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Backup](/images/fusion-backup.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Data service strategy for stateful containers"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiCK6_jZigo"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Data services for stateful containers](/images/data-services.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Backup IBM Cloud Pak for Data and restore it to the public cloud"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IZBSzbryLVc"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Backup Cloud Pak for Data](/images/backup-cp4d.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Regional disaster recovery explained"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l3zYfYafktI"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Regional disaster recovery](/images/regional-dr-df.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Interview with Pete Brey about Fusion and OpenShift"
  subTitle="Interview"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIBuKfB76Ho"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Fusion and OpenShift](/images/pete-brey.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Metro disaster recovery for a containerized application"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GO5B8BGA3F0"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Metro disaster recovery](/images/metro-dr-df.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Using Fusion directly within the OpenShift web console"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ui03JkbXjYQ"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Disaster recovery](/images/native-plugin.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Using Fusion data cataloging to analyze and govern healthcare images"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kqye5b17tcI"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Data cataloging](/images/data-cataloging.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Installing Data Foundation on a bare metal OpenShift cluster"
  subTitle="Demo"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yEVyZxlmX2Q"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Data Foundation install](/images/data-foundation-install.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
